params._newOwner: The address of the new owner. 0x0 can be used to create  an unowned neutral vault, however that cannot be undone

getHTLCLeftLockedTime(address,bytes32).return: time            return left locked time, in seconds. return uint(0xffffffffffffffff) if xHash does not exist

params.wanAddr: address of user, used to receive WERC20 token

params.ethAddr: address of ethereum, used to receive ERC20 token

changeOwner(address).notice: `owner` can step down and assign some other address to this role

getHTLCLeftLockedTime(address,bytes32).notice: get left locked time of the HTLC transaction

inboundLock(address,bytes32,address,uint.notice: request exchange WERC20 token with ERC20 token(to prevent collision, x must be a 256bit random bigint)

inboundRedeem(address,bytes32).notice: refund WERC20 token from recorded HTLC transaction, should be invoked before timeout

inboundRevoke(address,bytes32).notice: revoke HTLC transaction of exchange WERC20 token with ERC20 token

kill().notice: destruct SC and transfer balance to owner

outboundLock(address,bytes32,address,add.notice: request exchange ERC20 token with WERC20 token(to prevent collision, x must be a 256bit random bigint)

outboundRedeem(address,bytes32).notice: refund WERC20 token from the HTLC transaction of exchange ERC20 token with WERC20 token(must be called before HTLC timeout)

outboundRevoke(address,bytes32).notice: revoke HTLC transaction of exchange ERC20 token with WERC20 token(must be called after HTLC timeout)the revoking fee will be sent to storeman

setHalt(bool).notice: function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or not.

setLockedTime(uint256).notice: set locked time(only owner has the right)

setQuotaLedger(address).notice: set quota ledger SC address(only owner have the right)

setStoremanGroupAdmin(address).notice: set storeman group admin SC address(only owner have the right)

setTokenManager(address).notice: set tokenOrigAddr manager SC instance address

xHashExist(address,bytes32).notice: check HTLC transaction exist or not
